DOC.detailed_description: The study multicenter , multicountry , randomize , parallel-group , double blind , placebo paroxetine-controlled study consist three segment ( A , B , C ) . Segment A 1-week , placebo , single-blind period Segment B 8-week , double blind period . All randomized patient must complete post-study visit 1 week intake last dose study medication .
